## Properties

| Property      | Attribute     | Description | Type                                          | Default  |
| ------------- | ------------- | ----------- | --------------------------------------------- | -------- |
| `disabled`    | `disabled`    |             | `boolean`                                     | `false`  |
| `label`       | `label`       |             | `string`                                      | `''`     |
| `placeholder` | `placeholder` |             | `string`                                      | `''`     |
| `required`    | `required`    |             | `boolean`                                     | `false`  |
| `type`        | `type`        |             | `"email" \| "number" \| "password" \| "text"` | `'text'` |
| `value`       | `value`       |             | `string`                                      | `''`     |
